description: This file contains a function to generate a PDF report using the ReportLab library. It creates a multi-page PDF with cover, profile summary, KPIs, allocation, and goals sections based on provided data.

methods.name: generate_pdf(buffer, branding_title: str, profile: Dict, kpis: Dict, allocation: Dict[str, float], goal_table: List[Dict])
methods.description: Generates a multi-page PDF report with provided profile, KPI, allocation, and goal data, and writes it to a buffer.

ctags.name: generate_pdf
ctags.pattern: /^def generate_pdf(buffer, branding_title: str, profile: Dict, kpis: Dict, allocation: Dict[str, f/
ctags.signature: (buffer, branding_title: str, profile: Dict, kpis: Dict, allocation: Dict[str, float], goal_table: List[Dict])
